name: Guac Control: Avocardos
description:
The wait is over. Greg is back.

Guac Control: Avocardos is the sequel to 2020's surprise hit, Guac Control. 

This time Greg must wrestle with a whole new set of challenges, characters, and game genres in his quest to avenge his father.

In this world, conflict is decided via card game, and Greg's got no time for games. But he's gotta play by the rules. Maybe he doesn't, though. Who really knows?

Greg knows. He knows that he doesn't have time for games, yet he must play by the rules. What will he do? You decide. Or don't and do nothing.

You could go AFK. Do it, I dare you. Go AFK for an hour in game and see what happens. You won't be surprised. Nothing will happen. Greg wants you to do it though.

Will you listen to Greg? That's up to you. It's actually the last level of the game. You don't have a choice, though. Greg makes the decisions 'round here.
